item.title: Kathryn Ann add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "If I can't be beautiful, I want to be invisible." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Kathryn Ann add a quote by Meredith Ann Pierce
item.description: "I thought you had forgotten me.” “I have spent my life remembering you." -- Meredith Ann Pierce

item.title: Kathryn Ann add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Kathryn Ann add a quote by haruki murakami
item.description: "And once the storm is over, you won’t remember how you made it through, how you managed to survive. You won’t even be sure, whether the storm is really over. But one thing is certain. When you come out of the storm, you won’t be the same person who walked in. That’s what this storm’s all about." -- haruki murakami
